channel.title: H'earring on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in H'earring on Chaotic Online

item.title: Colosseum Showdown
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a little misunderstanding end up in an epic way in the best Real Steel style

item.title: Dual Duel (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Krystella and Klay up to no good (again), resulting in an interesting dual battle for the scan of a wicked Battlegear.

item.title: Dual Duel (Part 2)
item.description: In the continuation of the previous episode, we’ll not only see the ending of the battle in midst of Krystella and Klay’s mental games but we’ll see as well that… well… karma is a bitch ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

item.title: Elementary
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet the four Elemental Servants of the Lost City and a battle in Chaotic with them all at once

item.title: Fire Fighters
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a hot fight, literally, in which both players will try to prove their own superiority as well as of one of of the Four Elements.

item.title: Going Under
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a small part of one of the most known teachings of Sun Tzu’s The Art of War in Chaotic: Know your enemy!

item.title: Kickin' Bot
item.description: In this episode, Perim’s Dr. Frankenstein decides to implement part of his own brain in the Gigantroopers, making them intelligent enough to try to take over the Underworld, resulting in a battle in the best Pacific Rim style

item.title: Legions of Aa'une (Season Finale)
item.description: In this episode, the battle continues with overturns and some shifting… and the end!

item.title: Lord of Treachery
item.description: In this episode, we’ll meet the treacherous Lord Van Bloot, second in command of the Underworld, and how Chaor makes of Kaz his spy and uses the Chaotic battles as a military strategy against him

item.title: Mega Match
item.description: In this episode we’ll see the internal competition between Kaz and Peyton to see who is the best Chaotic player get to a next level… only now it’s up to Tom

item.title: Mister E
item.description: In this episode we’ll see more about the power of the M’arrillians and the beginning of one of the possible futures shown in “Time’s Up”

item.title: Rockwave and Roll
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a match between Peyton and his musical idol, with rights to a subtle tribute to one of KISS’ lead singer Gene Simmons

item.title: Scavenger Scan
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Kaz and Peyton competing with each other (again) to see who is the best player of Chaotic between them.

item.title: Son of the Spiritlands
item.description: In this episode, an indestructible Creature from the Spiritlands threatens to destroy the whole Perim unless Tangath Toborn faces him.

item.title: The Birth of Borth-Majar
item.description: In this episode we will know the origins of an unusual creature, Borth-Majar, and how Kaz deals with his collective individually personality (what? O.o)

item.title: The CodeMaster Chronicles (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll see the first part of the most amazing match in Chaotic: The battle between Tom Majors and the CodeMaster Crellan!

item.title: Unexpected
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet the fourth member of the group, Peyton, and his… “eccentric”, personality.
